data.message: Hey Slim for some reason i always come back to you and im sorry i get mad at you but i cant help it but im happy you popped up lol did u hear me calling lol if i ever do come to Detroit i wanna see u in concert thanks shady for coming thru for me lol by the way if u dont got.the gal to talk shit n show ur face without blocking it dont comment nothing on my page! By the way eminem might of signed them but i wont comment on them he started out with KR! Wth u tell me wth to do covert?
